Message.Title: Dell has sent out the letter. Silverlake deal is the one. Icahn offer was BS
Message.Msg: Its all over. The deal is done. Stock will be private in less than 2 months. 13.65 is locked now.

Topic.Title: Dell has sent out the letter. Silverlake deal is the one. Icahn offer was BS

Message.Msg: Nope. To the contrary, the deal is dead. Icahn and SE will fight it. No chance of it passing a vote. MD knows it. Icahn will push to have MD and the board removed.
